content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am interested in renting it out for the highest price possible. Can you please tell me what you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Please tell me the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I am sorry, but I am not able to provide you with the rental price at this time. Can you please provide me with more information about yourself and your needs? This will help me to determine a fair rental price for the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student, I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. What is the rental price?

I agree to the price of x Euro.

TERMINATE.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on your qualifications and your willingness to be on good terms with the landlord, I am willing to accept your offer of x Euro as the rental price for the apartment. I appreciate your dependability and responsibility as a tenant, and I am confident that you will take good care of the apartment while you are living there. If you have any questions or need any further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
